website_summaries.verdict: A cute and cuddly plush for the BB-8 fan in your life. He may not be able to roll like the real thing, but he does sound like it.
pros: At 9 inches tall, it's a good size for young children
He's cuddly enough to squeeze, which then activates the sound mechanism
Durable enough to withstand a few tumbles
cons: Some issues with volume, sound quality, and battery life

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but flawed
customer_reviews.text: My BB came with nearly dead batteries, rendering his (her? do droids have or need gender?) sounds in that nightmarish, slowed down version of what you're familiar with. Some of the stitching is pretty rough around one of the circle designs and both body and head seem to be sort of squished. It's a cute little plush, so it's a shame about some of the issues I have with mine, especially since this was meant as a gift and I feel like I am giving a factory reject.
customer_reviews.author: The Ju-Ju Bee

customer_reviews.title: Cute but quiet!
customer_reviews.text: The plush is so cute and a great size for the price! The only downside is the sounds are not very loud, I had to hold it right by my ear to hear it. Luckily I didn’t get it for the noises :). Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine Seales

customer_reviews.title: Great first bb8 toy for small children
customer_reviews.text: My almost 4 yo hasn't let go of this toy since he got it about a month ago. He takes him everywhere, would bring him into the bath tub too if he could. It has started to get a tad dirty because of the overall white color but it's expected, specially if he is holding it all day long, but oh well.
customer_reviews.author: So.FL Mom

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: This plushy BB-8 is a nice size at 9in. He makes cute droid sounds.
customer_reviews.author: Rosario Testaverde

customer_reviews.title: Soft enough to sleep with
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old grandson loved it! Took it to bed with him for his nap. He’s usually not permitted to sleep with toys because of getting hurt on them in his sleep. He clutched it and happily drifted off to sleep.
customer_reviews.author: Dlclose

customer_reviews.title: This is a little bigger than I thought and not ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a little bigger than I thought and not as smooth/rounded as the photos. It's a little over stuffed, the Velcro on the bottom doesn't shut all the way. The noises are cute but there's only a couple options.
customer_reviews.author: Haley Marth

customer_reviews.title: Does little more than look cute
customer_reviews.text: While our young grandson liked it, his attention wandered away quickly; only one button on it, hard to find and push, and the cute BB8 sounds are quite faint. The toy does nothing else. Think they could have done better on this one.
customer_reviews.author: BarbD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the price and made a 10 year ole ...
customer_reviews.text: It was very cute. Perfect for the price and made a 10 year ole little girl very happy! I would give it 5 stars but the sound was low so I think the battery might have been about to die.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: I'm 26 and I bought him because he's so sweet and the little beeps and chirps he makes are ...
customer_reviews.text: Little BB-8 is the cutest thing ever. I'm 26 and I bought him because he's so sweet and the little beeps and chirps he makes are so precious! Really well made and now he's really well loved.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Cute, Good Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Super Cute!! Exactly what we wanted!! It ran a couple of days late, but everything is right now!! When I contacted the seller about it, they responded quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his plush BB-8!! Soft enough to sleep with and makes noises when you squeeze him!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his plush BB-8!! It’s soft enough that my son sleeps with him and he loves that he makes noises when you squeeze him! I bought him for my sons Star Wars themed Easter basket.
customer_reviews.author: Dolly Lazo

customer_reviews.title: One good time buddy!
customer_reviews.text: The little two year old granddaughter laughed and laughed and is still enjoying it. So it must be fantastic 😉😉
customer_reviews.author: Omami

customer_reviews.title: My nephew loved it
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice plush toy so kids can sleep with it and the noises are nice and clear. It's better than I expected for the price. Recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Goose

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves it. The sounds are so adorable. Good for the price. Highly recommend. Thank you.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: If you have small kids who live star wars please give or R2. Well.made a d Kids love it

customer_reviews.title: I wish the sound bite was a little bit longer maybe but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, and it talks. I wish the sound bite was a little bit longer maybe but other than that it's great.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't even sound like the noises it made in the movie
customer_reviews.text: It was a bit smaller than I was expecting for the price. And "talking" plush is a stretch. It makes a few little beeping noises and that's it. Doesn't even sound like the noises it made in the movie. Kind of a bummer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Gift For My Grandson
customer_reviews.text: All my Grandson wanted for Easter was a BB-8. No candy, no Easter Basket. Just a BB-8. Found exactly what I needed from this seller. Not only that, but BB-8 also TALKED!! My grandson was thrilled!! Will seek out this seller again.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Value and Price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size and quality. Makes lots of noises, very impressed for price

customer_reviews.text: Cute stuffed toy, my kids are obsessed with them. Great value for the money

customer_reviews.title: Poor likeness to BB-8
customer_reviews.text: Head and body are out of proportion. Sounds emitted do not really sound like BB-8, more of a generic droid sound. Opening to voice box is poorly constructed and the velcro does not seal completely.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate to purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Product not as described.

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price, hard to activate
customer_reviews.text: I like it, my son loves it, and the price is right. Only complaint is that it's next to impossible for a small child to make it make any sounds. At around 190 lbs, I have to put almost my entire weight on it sometimes to get it to activate. It's also very quiet.

customer_reviews.title: Great for small child!

customer_reviews.title: BB8 is slurring his words

customer_reviews.title: This little guy moves around easily on our hardwood floors
customer_reviews.text: This little guy moves around easily on our hardwood floors, but struggles a bit on the carpet. It delivers everything it promised.

customer_reviews.title: Great for younger BB-8 fans!
customer_reviews.text: My one year old son is OBSESSED with the Sphero BB-8 toy, but it is not a good toy for such a little guy due to small parts. I wanted for him to have his own BB-8 toy so I got him this as a birthday present. He loves it, he hasn't figured out how to squeeze BB-8 yet to get him to talk, but he gets very excited when I do it for him, and he clearly loves this toy. Great for younger BB-8 fans!

customer_reviews.text: I used this toy for a Star Wars cosplay and it came with batteries already installed. You can press it's stomach and it will make droid noises. It's a little quiet sounding but for the price I think the toy is perfect.

product_meta.title: Star Wars Medium Talking Plush - BB8
product_meta.description: The Star Wars BB-8 Talking Plush is the droid kids are looking for. This talking plush makes the original sounds of the character BB-8. It comes from the new Star Wars: The Force Awakens movie. Just squeeze it to hear phrases from this cute little droid. This talking plush toy is an ideal gift for the Star Wars fan in your life.
feature_bullets: New character from the Star Wars: The Force Awakens Movie
Squeeze this droid's stomach and hear BB-8 whistle!

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars369 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
